article_title: Chipotle Mexican Grill Co-CEOs’ 2014 Compensation Up 15%
article_text:
Chipotle Mexican Grill Inc. Chief Executives Steve Ells and Monty Moran’s 2014 compensation were valued at $28.9 million and $24.4 million, respectively, up 15% from the year earlier, according to a regulatory filing.

Their base pay remained $1.4 million and $1.2 million, respectively. Mr. Ells also serves as chairman.

Meanwhile, Chief...
